content: विलक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Having no characteristic or distinguishing marks. {@--2@} Bewildered, embarrassed. {@--3@} Surprised, astonished. {@--4@} Ashamed, abashed, disconcerted; गोत्रेषु स्खलितस्तदा भवति च व्रीडाविलक्षश्चिरं <ls>Ś. 6. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Forced, unnatural, embarrassed (as a smile); विलक्षस्मितस्फुरितैर्दशनांशुभिः <ls>K. 233</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 3. 14.</ls>
